titleStmt.title: SII 7.429: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 429. (A.R. No. 216 of 1901). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . svasti samastajagadādhāra somakulatilaka madhurāpurimādhava keraḷavaṃśanirmūlana laṅkādvipaluṇṭanadvitiyarāmacoḷakulaśailakuliśa karṇṇāṭarājavidrāvaṇa kāṭhakakarikūṭapākala vividharipudurggamarddana viragaṇḍagopālavipinadāvadahana kāñcīpuravarādhīśvara gaṇapatihariṇa
śārdūla nelūrapuraviracitavirābhiṣeka praṇatarājapratiṣṭhāpaka mahārājādhirāja parameśvara tribhuvanacakravat=tikaḷ śrīsundarapāṇḍidevar Uttarameruccaturvvetimaṅkalattup paṟṟāṉa vaṅkārattu Ūrārkku Eyilkoṭṭattu tirumākaṟal tiruvakattiśvaramuṭaiya nāyaṉārkku namperāl kaṭṭiṉa cuntara
pāṇṭiyaṉ tirunāḷukkum pūjaikkum Amutupaṭi cāttuppaṭi Uḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭuvaṉavuk kuṭalākat taṅkaḷuril nālpāṟkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa naṉcey puṉcey Eppeyaṟpaṭṭaṉavukkum tāṅkaḷ Iṟukkum kaṭamai poṉvari viṉiyokam Āyavaṟkam Upātikaḷ Uṭpaṭa sarvvamāyaṅkaḷum Eḻāvatu nāḷ nūṟṟuttoṇṇūṟṟunālu mutal tevatāṉa Iṟai
Iliyākak kuṭuttu variyilum kaḻippatākac coṉṉom Ivai Innāḷmutal Ikkoyil tāṉattārvacame kuṭuttuppotavum Ippaṭi ka nāṉkellaiyilum tiruccūlasthāpaṉamum paṇṇik kallilum cempilum veṭṭavum pārkka Ivai pāṇṭimaṇṭalattu muttūṟṟukūṟṟunāṭṭu Antaṇūrcciṟukampūr vaṇṭu
varāpati viṟṟiruntāṉāṉa paḻantiyarāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ikkal veṭṭiṉa vaṅkāramāṉa cuntarapāṇṭiyanallūril Uṭaiyār tiruvira kum vināyakappiḷḷaiyārkkum tevatāṉam kuḻi Iraṇṭāyirattu muṉṉūṟṟunālum Aḻicavūr Uṭaiyār Aruḷāḷiśvaramuṭaiya nāyaṉār tevatāṉam kuḻi toḷāyirattu Aympatu
m maṭappuṟam kuḻi Irunūṟum varatarājaviṇṇakar Emperumāṉ tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam kuḻi nāṉūṟum piṭārippaṭṭi kuḻi nūṟṟunāṟpattuāṟum Āka kuḻi 4 1000 Ikkuḻi nālāyiramum Ittevarkaḷukku candrādit=tavarai cellakkaṭavatu .

app.note: The two letters kaḷ have been entered after śrī in smaller characters.

div.p: Digital edition of SII 7.429 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
